control_attributes.control_description: The organization: a. Establishes a process for maintenance personnel authorization and maintains a list of authorized maintenance organizations or personnel;b. Ensures that non-escorted personnel performing maintenance on the information system have required access authorizations; andc. Designates organizational personnel with required access authorizations and technical competence to supervise the maintenance activities of personnel who do not possess the required access authorizations.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization employs automated mechanisms to transfer predictive maintenance data to a computerized maintenance management system.

Control Statement: The organization: a. Establishes a process for maintenance personnel authorization and maintains a list of authorized maintenance organizations or personnel;b. Ensures that non-escorted personnel performing maintenance on the information system have required access authorizations; andc. Designates organizational personnel with required access authorizations and technical competence to supervise the maintenance activities of personnel who do not possess the required access authorizations.
